articles.author: Mary Gearin
articles.title: Technology-facilitated abuse is creating 'terror' in women, and it's on the rise in Australia - ABC News
articles.description: Rose was constantly monitored by her ex-partner using an app on her phone. Technology-facilitated abuse is a growing problem and includes monitoring phone use, sending text messages and, in one, case fitting a kill switch to a car.
articles.content:
A seemingly innocent tracking app on *Rose's phone was the secret weapon her abuser used to keep her in a constant state of fear.
